title: Mike Gleason - Grudge Match 2008

asset.author: Volcom
asset.hookText: A few weeks back Mike Gleason took 2nd place at New Jersey's infamous Garden State Grudge Match.  Gleason won the event back in 2006, but fell a point short of claiming the Grudge Match Champion belt in the man vs. man final against his good friend and travel partner Sam Hammer.  The waves were darn good and Gleason was ripping...check it yo.
